Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Samsung is giving away free smartphones in Indonesia during the Covid-19 pandemic. The expert's verdict confirms that the claim is false and that Samsung has stated it is a scam.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Samsung is giving away free cellphones when it is not.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official announcement from Samsung regarding the giveaway.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that it is a scam or a false announcement made by someone impersonating Samsung.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Samsung is giving away free cellphones without any evidence or confirmation from the company.
Understate: There is no understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by spreading false information about Samsung giving away free cellphones.
Biases not identified: It is difficult to identify any other biases in this claim.
